snippet.title: Kudamono Drop: First Look Gameplay
snippet.description:
Kudamono Drop is a game all about catching fruit! Slide your basket left and right as the fruits fall from the top of the screen. Catch as many small fruits as you can, but be careful! There are larger fruits that can't fit in your basket, so try to avoid them.

Some of the game's features include:
・Many different fruit drawn in a kawaii style!
・Addictive gameplay!
・100 levels with unique gimmicks, and a boss battle at the end!
・Endless mode with leaderboards!
・Music in a kawaii EDM style!
・Various cosmetic options!
・Achievements!
・Entirely playable offline!

Kudamono Drop is available to download now on iOS and Android!

iOS:
https://apps.apple.com/app/id6499032692

Android:
https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0D6PV9KKS/ref=apps_sf_sta
https://gamejolt.com/games/kudamono-drop/903284
https://toranekogames.itch.io/kudamono-drop

Also out now on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3162550/Kudamono_Drop/


Listen to the OST on Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/artist/3umXvMZOR2jyPPCgb45xYE?si=roLA4KZ_TduscQhz4ELFqA
Listen to the OST on Apple Music: https://music.apple.com/us/artist/toranekogames/1721763566
